briefdescription.para: Enumerator to represent the Acquisition time.
Enumerator to represent the Input channel, This is applicable for single trigger mode only.

detaileddescription.para: Single ended ext. ref. from pin 6.
Differential ext. ref. from pin 6 and 7.

briefdescription.para: Enumerator to represent the reference voltage.
Constant values to represent the Input channel, This is applicable for scan trigger mode only.

simplesect.para: For multiple channel selection User needs to bitwise OR the respective Scan channels mentioned below for Proper operation

briefdescription.para: ADC_T is a generic hardware handle,which is void pointer guaranteed to store pointer to integer.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* Mcu_Adc_Callback_T)(ADC_T adc, Mcu_Adc_Event_T event, uint16_t *bufferPtr)
memberdef.name: Mcu_Adc_Callback_T

parameterdescription.para: Represents the pointer value of the result buffer for processing

briefdescription.para: De-initialize and powers down the ADC interface.

detaileddescription.para:
adc
: ADC handle.
RETCODE_OK
upon successful execution, error otherwise
De-initialize and powers down the ADC interface.

adc
: ADC handle.
callback
: Function pointer to a callback function which handles the ADC events.
RETCODE_OK
upon successful execution, error otherwise
Initialize the ADC Interface.

briefdescription.para: Start Scan Mode on ADC Interface & Start the PRS Timer as producer.

detaileddescription.para:
adc
: ADC handle.
configScan
: Structure which holds the configurations related to scan mode.
The sampling rate must be limited to minimum and maximum range mentioned by macro ADC_MIN_SAMPLING_FREQUENCY and ADC_MAX_SAMPLING_FREQUENCY respectively

RETCODE_OK
upon successful execution, error otherwise
Start Scan Mode on ADC Interface & Start the PRS Timer as producer.

briefdescription.para: Start Single Mode on ADC Interface.

detaileddescription.para:
adc
: ADC handle.
configStart
: Structure which holds the configurations related to single mode.
RETCODE_OK
upon successful execution, error otherwise
Start Single Mode on ADC Interface.

briefdescription.para: Stop the Scan mode on ADC Interface and stops the PRS timer used for sampling adc channels.

detaileddescription.para:
adc
: ADC handle.
RETCODE_OK
upon successful execution, error otherwise
Stop the Scan mode on ADC Interface and stops the PRS timer used for sampling adc channels.
